title: Fastest growing internet companies 2017
summary: The Fastest growing Platform in the companies 2017 was Platform Arista_Networks , who made 52 average .
The most growing Platform was Ellie_Mae , with just 28 average .

In second place was Platform Facebook with 51 average ; third place went to Platform GrubHub with 52 average ; fourth place went to Platform Shutterstock with 28 average and fifth place went to Platform Paycom_Software , who was 46 average .
gold: This statistic gives information on the fastest growing online and tech companies in 2017 , based on three-year average sales growth . Food delivery platform GrubHub went public in 2014 and was ranked first with a three-year average sales growth of 52 percent .
